channel.title: London Evening Standard | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/eveningstandard

item.title: French authorities have handed Telegram chief executive Pave
item.description: French authorities have handed Telegram chief executive Pavel Durov preliminary charges for allowing alleged criminal activity on his messaging app

item.title: A man in his 30s has been stabbed to death in daylight on a
item.description: A man in his 30s has been stabbed to death in daylight on a street in east London
